title: Research Guides: Diet, Nutrition, & Health: Foods as Medicine
author: Jessica Spears
description: A topic guide covering aspects of diet, nutrition, and health.
cleaned_text: Is there a substantial link between diet and disease prevention? Professor Crittenden explains the medicinal histories behind several foods. Among them are ginger (thought to help with digestive issues) and cinnamon (used in traditional Chinese medicine to treat various ailments), as well as goji berries, chocolate, and pomegranate.
